name: turbulenceforecast
0:
”Alexa ask my flight forecast how is the turbulence for my flight”
”how bad is the turbulence in the U.S”
”what is my turbulence forecast”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my flight forecast
Developer Terms of Use
des: In the past travelling passengers would rely on the pilots to let them know how their flight conditions will be, until now. MyFlight Forecast is happy to provide real time turbulence conditions that are made available to you prior to your flight. As youre packing for your trip, you can stay informed by asking Alexa about your turbulence forecast, or whether your flight will be bumpy, she will then ask MyFlight Forecast to scan the skies and we will provide you with the overall flight conditions over the United States.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
